title: How do I save a message draft?
answer:
Go to the message editing page and select the back button. The message will be automatically saved as a draft in the current conversation. The message that you previously edited will be displayed automatically when entering the conversation. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=97008)

 A message can only be saved as a draft when valid recipient information has been entered. Messages cannot be saved when no recipient has been entered.
